name: backup-folder
title: Backup a Folder
description: Backup a folder to a specified location using GTAR
author: dawes

preferences.name: gtarPath
preferences.title: Path to gtar
preferences.description: Full path to the GNU tar (gtar) executable. Defaults to Homebrew location.

preferences.name: sourceDirectory
preferences.title: Source Directory to Backup
preferences.description: Full path to the directory you want to back up (e.g., /Users/you/Projects or ~/Projects).

preferences.name: backupDestination
preferences.title: Backup Destination Directory
preferences.description: Full path to the directory where backup archives (.tar.gz) will be stored.

preferences.name: archivePrefix
preferences.title: Archive Filename Prefix
preferences.description: Optional prefix for the backup filename. If left blank, defaults to the name of the source directory (e.g., 'Projects_').

preferences.name: retentionDays
preferences.title: Backup Retention (Days)
preferences.description: Delete backups older than this many days when running 'Clean Old Backups'. Set to 0 or leave blank to disable cleanup.

preferences.name: moveToTrash
preferences.title: Move Old Backups to Trash
preferences.description: Instead of permanently deleting, move files older than retention period to the system Trash.
preferences.label: Move to Trash instead of deleting

commands.name: backup-folder
commands.title: Create New Backup
commands.subtitle: Create a timestamped archive of your source folder
commands.description: Immediately creates a compressed backup (.tar.gz) of the source folder defined in preferences, saving it to the destination folder.

commands.name: cleanup-backups
commands.title: Apply Backup Retention
commands.subtitle: Remove expired backup archives
commands.description: Scans the backup destination and removes archive files older than the retention period set in preferences (moves to Trash or deletes permanently).

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
